fields.name: cruise
fields.title: Cruise
fields.description: name of cruise from which samples were taken

fields.name: station_number
fields.title: Station number
fields.description: unique number of oceanographic station within ACE cruise where the trace metal rosette deployment took place, alongside other instrument deployments

fields.name: event_number
fields.title: Event number
fields.description: unique number of instrument deployment event within ACE from which samples were collected

fields.name: datetime [UTC]
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: date and time at which the trace metal rosette deployment started in ISO8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: latitude [degN]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: latitude of research vessel at start of trace metal rosette deployment from which samples were collected [decimal degrees N]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude of research vessel at start of trace metal rosette deployment from which samples were collected

fields.name: longitude [degE]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: longitude of research vessel at start of trace metal rosette deployment from which samples were collected [decimal degrees E]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude of research vessel at start of trace metal rosette deployment from which samples were collected

fields.name: sample_depth [m]
fields.title: Sample depth
fields.description: depth below sea surface at which samples were collected from the trace metal rosette [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: depth below sea surface at which samples were collected from the trace metal rosette

fields.name: hydrolysable_carbohydrate_concentration [µmol/L]
fields.title: Concentration of hydrolysable carbohydrate
fields.description: average concentration of hydrolysable carbohydrates (TPZT) in carbon (average taken from three samples of seawater) [µmol/L]
